about_the_game:
PLEASE NOTE
Hell-O-Ween is currently in Early Access, we are still adding new content to the game and improving multiplayer stability and performance. We are looking for players who want to play the early version of the game, and hopefully also get involved in its development.
_______
Santa is real, but missing.
Halloween is real, but not a festival.
Myths are real, but nightmares.
A world filled with horror, but summoned hope.

Oh Heroes summoned from different worlds, this world needs you. A evil is corroding this world, once graced with beauty and peace.
Beings who once knew kindness, have turned into monsters.
Monsters once considered myths, are roaming around.
The ruler of the world is nowhere to be found, instead a sinister laugh is heard.

Explore the world of Hell-O-Ween to uncover the truth, hunt the horrors and find Santa.

_______
This is a MOBA-RPG game with PvP, PvE and RPG exploration themed towards Halloween and Christmas.
The game tries to incorporate elements from both MOBA and MMORPG genre to create best of both worlds.
_______

FEATURES
_______
-Open world for exploration, with massive multiplayer (upto 100 players per map)
-MOBA-like PvP with more game modes like deathmatch, battle royale, etc.
-MMORPG-like PvE, world bosses, events, exploration, hunts, farming, etc.
-Unique set of characters, each with their own skill-set, with more characters unlockable throughout gameplay, including the nightmares.
-Weapons (and weapon skill) equipable by any character, giving more depth to gameplay
-Third-Person camera (rpg) with simpler controls (moba).

name: Hell-O-Ween

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 520
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Santa is real, but missing. Halloween is real, but not a festival. Myths are real, but nightmares. A world filled with horror, but summoned hope. Explore the world of Hell-O-Ween to uncover the truth, hunt the horrors and find Santa. A MOBA-MMORPG game themed towards Halloween and Christmas.
